text: Now as Jesus was passing by, he saw a man who had been blind from birth.

<st data-num="846" class="">His</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="2065" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="4461">Rabbi</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> <st data-num="264">committed the sin</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> caused <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to be <st data-num="1080" class="">born</st> <st data-num="5185" class="">blind</st>, <st data-num="3778">this man</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1118" class="">parents</st>?”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>, “<st data-num="3777" class="">Neither</st> <st data-num="3778">this man</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3777" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1118" class="">parents</st> <st data-num="264" class="">sinned</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> he was born blind <st data-num="2443">so that</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="2041" class="">acts</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> may be <st data-num="5319" class="">revealed</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">through</st> what happens to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1473" class="">We</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> <st data-num="2038" class="">perform</st> the <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st><n id="1" /> of the one who <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2193">as long as</st><n id="3" /> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">daytime</st>. <st data-num="3571" class="">Night</st> is <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> <st data-num="3762">no one</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="2038" class="">work</st>.

<st data-num="3752">As long as</st> I am <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>, I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> the <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st> of the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>.”<n id="1" />

Having <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="4429" class="">spat</st> <st data-num="5476">on the ground</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">made</st> some <st data-num="4081" class="">mud</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="4427" class="">saliva</st>. He<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2025" class="">smeared</st> the <st data-num="4081" class="">mud</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">the blind man’s</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="3788" class="">eyes</st>
and said to him, “Go wash in the pool of Siloam” (which is translated “sent”). So the blind man went away and washed, and came back seeing.
Then the neighbors and the people who had seen him previously as a beggar began saying, “Is this not the man who used to sit and beg?”

<st data-num="243" class="">Some people</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="3778">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the man!”<n id="2" /> while <st data-num="243" class="">others</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="3756">No</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">looks</st> <st data-num="3664" class="">like</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.”<n id="3" /> The <st data-num="1565" class="">man himself</st><n id="4" /> kept <st data-num="3004" class="">insisting</st>, “<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> the one!”<n id="5" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> they <st data-num="3004" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="4459">How</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">then</st> were <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> made to <st data-num="455 3788">see</st>?”<n id="2" />

He <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “The <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">called</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">made</st> <st data-num="4081" class="">mud</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2025" class="">smeared</st> it<n id="3" /> on <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eyes</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>,<n id="4" /> ‘<st data-num="5217">Go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4611" class="">Siloam</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3538" class="">wash.’</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> I <st data-num="565" class="">went</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3538" class="">washed</st>, and was <st data-num="308">able to see</st>.”<n id="5" />
They said to him, “Where is that man?” He replied, “I don’t know.”
They brought the man who used to be blind to the Pharisees.

(<st data-num="1161">Now</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">made</st> the <st data-num="4081" class="">mud</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="455" class="">caused</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to <st data-num="3788">see</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="4521">Sabbath</st>.)<n id="3" />
So the Pharisees asked him again how he had gained his sight. He replied, “He put mud on my eyes and I washed, and now I am able to see.”

Then some of the Pharisees began to say, “This man is not from God because he does not observe the Sabbath.” But others said, “How can a man who is a sinner perform such miraculous signs?” Thus there was a division among them.
So again they asked the man who used to be blind, “What do you say about him, since he caused you to see?” “He is a prophet,” the man replied.
Now the Jewish religious leaders refused to believe that he had really been blind and had gained his sight until at last they summoned the parents of the man who had become able to see.

They <st data-num="2065" class="">asked</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">parents</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1510">Is</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st><n id="2" /> was <st data-num="1080" class="">born</st> <st data-num="5185" class="">blind</st>? <st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> does he <st data-num="737" class="">now</st> <st data-num="991" class="">see</st>?”

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1118" class="">parents</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “We <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> he was <st data-num="1080" class="">born</st> <st data-num="5185" class="">blind</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> we do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> he is <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> <st data-num="991">able to see</st>, <st data-num="3756" class="">nor</st> do <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> <st data-num="455" class="">caused</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to <st data-num="3788" class="">see</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2065" class="">Ask</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, he <st data-num="2192" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="2244">mature adult</st>.<n id="2" /> He will <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st>.”

(<st data-num="846" class="">His</st> <st data-num="1118" class="">parents</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> they were <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st> of the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jewish religious leaders</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="2453">Jewish leaders</st> had <st data-num="2235" class="">already</st> <st data-num="4934" class="">agreed</st> <st data-num="2443">that</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> who <st data-num="3670" class="">confessed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="3" /> would <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> <st data-num="656">put out<n id="4" /> of the synagogue</st>.<n id="5" />
For this reason his parents said, “He is a mature adult, ask him.”)
Then they summoned the man who used to be blind a second time and said to him, “Promise before God to tell the truth. We know that this man is a sinner.”

He <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">whether</st> <st data-num="1565">he</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="268" class="">sinner</st>. I do <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="1520">one thing</st>—<st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> although I <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="5185" class="">blind</st>, <st data-num="737" class="">now</st> I can <st data-num="991" class="">see</st>.”

<st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> they <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="5101">What</st> did he <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>? <st data-num="4459" class="">How</st> did he <st data-num="455" class="">cause</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to <st data-num="3788" class="">see</st>?”<n id="1" />
He answered, “I told you already and you didn’t listen. Why do you want to hear it again? You people don’t want to become his disciples too, do you?”
They heaped insults on him, saying, “You are his disciple! We are disciples of Moses!

<st data-num="1473">We</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="2980" class="">spoken</st> to <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st>! We do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4159" class="">where</st> this man<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510">comes</st> <st data-num="4159" class="">from</st>!”

The <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="3778">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="2298">remarkable thing</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3756">don’t</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4159" class="">where</st> he <st data-num="1510">comes</st> <st data-num="4159">from</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> yet he <st data-num="455" class="">caused</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> to <st data-num="3788" class="">see</st>!<n id="3" />

We <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3756">doesn’t</st> <st data-num="191" class="">listen</st> to<n id="1" /> <st data-num="268" class="">sinners</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2318" class="">devout</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">does</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2307" class="">will</st>, God<n id="3" /> <st data-num="191" class="">listens</st> to<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">him</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="165 3756">Never</st> before<n id="1" /> has anyone <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> of <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="455" class="">causing</st> a man <st data-num="1080" class="">born</st> <st data-num="5185" class="">blind</st> to <st data-num="3788" class="">see</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="3778">this man</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510">were</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, he <st data-num="1410" class="">could</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3762">nothing</st>.”
They replied, “You were born completely in sinfulness, and yet you presume to teach us?” So they threw him out.
Jesus heard that they had thrown him out, so he found the man and said to him, “Do you believe in the Son of Man?”

The <st data-num="1565" class="">man</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="2532">And</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> he, <st data-num="2962" class="">sir</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st><n id="3" /> I may <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “You have <st data-num="3708" class="">seen</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him;</st> he<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="1565" class="">one</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">speaking</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.”<n id="2" /> [

He <st data-num="5346" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, I <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st>,” <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="4352" class="">worshiped</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="1" />
Jesus said,] “For judgment I have come into this world, so that those who do not see may gain their sight, and the ones who see may become blind.”
Some of the Pharisees who were with him heard this and asked him, “We are not blind too, are we?”
Jesus replied, “If you were blind, you would not be guilty of sin, but now because you claim that you can see, your guilt remains.
